verses.text: Mamin Jehová, manh in a tumej yet' yowal a k'ool. Manh ak' in yaelal ayic scot owal t'ayin.
Mamin, ok'oc wal a k'ool t'ayin, yujto manhxalaj wip swab'i. Mamin, ak'xi b'ox in k'ool yujto a in niwanil tik sluclon yuj manh ipal.
Te somchajnac in k'ool. Ha achxo Mamin Jehová, ¿b'aq'uinh ol ach och wed'oc?
Mamin Jehová, ochanh wal k'elan t'ayin, colinel yet' wal a niwan wach'k'olal.
¿Tom ay mach olto ach naancotoc ayic toxo ix chami? Malaj junok mach ol b'itan t'ayach t'a skal heb' yetchamnaquil chi'.
Ste el wip woq'ui. Manh jantacoc wok' t'a junjun ak'wal. Sch'ayxiel in k'anh jolom yuj yal in sat.
Maxtzac yal-laj wilani, yujto ix mal in sat woq'ui yujnhej heb' ayoch ajk'olal t'ayin.
Elanhec t'a in tz'ey a ex to anhej chukal tze k'ulej. Toxo ix yab' Jehová in sik'sik'an woq'ui.
Toxo ix yab' in tewi t'ay. Toxo ix scha in lesal.
Ha heb' ayoch ajk'olal t'ayin, ol kan heb' t'a q'uixwelal. Tonhej ol somchajcanel heb'. D'a junnhej mutz'satil ol kan heb' t'a q'uixwelk'olal.
